results.name: Number of rooted non-separable n-edge maps in the plane (planar with a distinguished outside face).
reference: V. A. Liskovets and T. R. Walsh, Enumeration of unrooted maps on the plane, Rapport technique, UQAM, No. 2005-01, Montreal, Canada, 2005.
link: V. A. Liskovets and T. R. Walsh, Counting unrooted maps on the plane, Advances in Applied Math., 36, No.4 (2006), 364-387.
results.author: _Valery A. Liskovets_, Mar 17 2005
